Age : 19 45 ( include 19 , 45 ) year old . 3 . Male body weight ≥ 50kg , female body weight ≥ 45kg , body mass index within normal range ( weight ( kg ) / height 2 ( m2 ) = 1825 ) . 4 . Informed consent form obtain . Subjects exclude entry criterion list meet : 1 . History drug hypersensitivity . 3 . Female urine pregnancy test positive . 4 . Positive serologic finding human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) antibody , hepatitis B surface antigen ( HBsAg ) , hepatitis B e antigen ( HBeAg ) , and/or hepatitis C virus ( HCV ) antibody . 5 .
